text: these are the images known to the world
that marked the end of the Vietnam War
Saigon capital of South Vietnam found
two forces of the communist north on the
30th of April 1975 for many Vietnamese
however their memories are somewhat
different
the conflict caused over three million
lives even today many still search for
the remains of their loved ones my
family is among those my mother sent
East when cui was not Vietnam first
woman were correspondent she was killed
in 1969 while traveling with a group of
Vietcong guerrillas in central Vietnam
they were hiding from South Korean
Marines allies of the Americans
the guerillas escaped but my mother had
been wounded and was left behind she was
never seen again
my mother's remains still have not been
found
my family has visited the area around
among many times like others who
excavated the entire area by hand we
have even employed clairvoyance on
that's been found a single button and a
hair clip both possibly is hers
possibly not we are of course no
isolated case there is barely a family
in this country who doesn't feel grief
for someone who was lost in the conflict
the past is never truly gone
on the day that Saigon fell I was among
children marching through the streets of
Hanoi in celebration just days earlier
my father owns a war reporter had
returned from the war he finally broke
the news of my mother's death to the
family although her death have been
suspected my grandmother trembled and
grasped the site of a cupboard she stood
like that in silence
for a long time we had to mourn my
mother's death at the same time as we
celebrated the return of my father and
the end to war in sunlight we loved in
darkness we cried we were also hoping
for reunion with the other half of the
family that lived in the south but our
excitement was misplaced some family
members were imprisoned for fighting the
north some chose exile
even today in my family one half talks
of the conflict as the Vietnam War the
other half as the war against America
yet we survived on the spot where my
mother was last seen we erected a model
stone in her memory it comforts us to
know her soul has somewhere to rest but
the questions about what happened to her
where her body lies don't go away
